alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hamilton; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 11 at 3:15PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Hamilton, Kearny and Finney Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
